title: Road House 1989 1080p Rifftrax1-3Riffer Rifftrax2-Mike 6ch 2ch
description:
Road.House.1989.1080p.Rifftrax1-3Riffer.Rifftrax2-Mike.6ch.2ch.mkv

DEFAULT AUDIO IS TRACK1 MOVIE PLUS 2016 THREE-RIFFER EDITION RIFFTRAX
TRACK2 IS MOVIE PLUS 2006 ORIGINAL ONLY MIKE RIFFTRAX
FOR MOVIE ONLY SOUND SWITCH TO TRACK3 FOR 5.1 OR TRACK4 FOR 2.0

Road House (1989)
video: 1920x820 AVC
audio1 (default): movie plus 2016 Three-Riffer Edition Rifftrax AAC 2.0 Stereo
audio2: movie plus 2006 Original Only Mike Rifftrax AAC 2.0 Stereo
audio3: just movie AAC 5.1 Surround
audio4: just movie AAC 2.0 Stereo
subs: English built in, off by default, not hard coded, software switchable
intros: 1s after the last riff comment
2,337,754,513bytes 1h54m22s except audio2 1h56m04s
2016.09.09 Rifftrax Three-Riffer Edition = Bill Corbett, Kevin Murphy, Mike Nelson
2006.07.21 Rifftrax Original Only Mike = Mike Nelson
1989.05.19 Movie USA Release
  http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0098206/  

This is a quad-audio remux including: the new "2016 Three-Riffer Edition Rifftrax" commentary (default) and the "Original Only Mike Rifftrax" plus 2 movie only tracks, 5.1 surround and 2.0 stereo. Both Rifftrax audio tracks have been remastered to ensure the riff comments are just loud enough to be clear when the movie is loud and not too loud when the movie is quiet. Please leave any feedback regarding the Rifftrax audio remastering.

A very special thanks to the anonymous author who did a remastered version with the 2006 Rifftrax. The high definition video, 5.1 and 2.0 movie audio, the subs, and chapters were sourced from this older edition. Both Rifftrax on audio1-2016 and audio2-2006 were remastered for this version.

Please check out other Rifftrax, MST3K, DC Comics, Gotham (TV series), FANEDITS, documentaries, Battlestar Galactica, Star Trek, and more at:

and leave any corrections, criticism, comments and requests.

Thanks, bsg4you
